org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

类 Instance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.Instance
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SlotOwner

    public class Instance
extends java.lang.Object
implements SlotOwner
    An instance represents a TaskManager registered at a JobManager and ready to receive work.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.util.Set<Slot> allocatedSlots
      Allocated slots on this taskManager
      private java.util.Queue<java.lang.Integer> availableSlots
      A list of available slot positions
      private InstanceID instanceId
      The ID identifying the taskManager.
      private java.lang.Object instanceLock
      The lock on which to synchronize allocations and failure state changes
      private boolean isDead
      Flag marking the instance as alive or as dead.
      private long lastReceivedHeartBeat
      Time when last heat beat has been received from the task manager running on this taskManager.
      private TaskManagerLocation location
      The instance connection information for the data transfer.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private int numberOfSlots
      The number of task slots available on the node
      private HardwareDescription resources
      A description of the resources of the task manager
      private SlotAvailabilityListener slotAvailabilityListener
      A listener to be notified upon new slot availability
      private TaskManagerGateway taskManagerGateway
      The instance gateway to communicate with the instance

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Instance

        public Instance(TaskManagerGateway taskManagerGateway,
                TaskManagerLocation location,
                InstanceID id,
                HardwareDescription resources,
                int numberOfSlots)
        Constructs an instance reflecting a registered TaskManager.
        参数:
        taskManagerGateway - The actor gateway to communicate with the remote instance
        location - The remote connection where the task manager receives requests.
        id - The id under which the taskManager is registered.
        resources - The resources available on the machine.
        numberOfSlots - The number of task slots offered by this taskManager.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTaskManagerID

        public ResourceID getTaskManagerID()

      • getId

        public InstanceID getId()

      • getResources

        public HardwareDescription getResources()

      • getTotalNumberOfSlots

        public int getTotalNumberOfSlots()

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()

      • markDead

        public void markDead()

      • getLastHeartBeat

        public long getLastHeartBeat()
        Gets the timestamp of the last heartbeat.
        返回:
        The timestamp of the last heartbeat.

      • reportHeartBeat

        public void reportHeartBeat()
        Updates the time of last received heart beat to the current system time.

      • isStillAlive

        public boolean isStillAlive(long now,
                            long cleanUpInterval)
        Checks whether the last heartbeat occurred within the last n milliseconds before the given timestamp now.
        参数:
        now - The timestamp representing the current time.
        cleanUpInterval - The maximum time (in msecs) that the last heartbeat may lie in the past.
        返回:
        True, if this taskManager is considered alive, false otherwise.

      • allocateSimpleSlot

        public SimpleSlot allocateSimpleSlot(JobID jobID)
                              throws InstanceDiedException
        Allocates a simple slot on this TaskManager instance. This method returns null, if no slot is available at the moment.
        参数:
        jobID - The ID of the job that the slot is allocated for.
        返回:
        A simple slot that represents a task slot on this TaskManager instance, or null, if the TaskManager instance has no more slots available.
        抛出:
        InstanceDiedException - Thrown if the instance is no longer alive by the time the slot is allocated.

      • allocateSharedSlot

        public SharedSlot allocateSharedSlot(JobID jobID,
                                     SlotSharingGroupAssignment sharingGroupAssignment)
                              throws InstanceDiedException
        Allocates a shared slot on this TaskManager instance. This method returns null, if no slot is available at the moment. The shared slot will be managed by the given SlotSharingGroupAssignment.
        参数:
        jobID - The ID of the job that the slot is allocated for.
        sharingGroupAssignment - The assignment group that manages this shared slot.
        返回:
        A shared slot that represents a task slot on this TaskManager instance and can hold other (shared) slots, or null, if the TaskManager instance has no more slots available.
        抛出:
        InstanceDiedException - Thrown if the instance is no longer alive by the time the slot is allocated.

      • returnAllocatedSlot

        public boolean returnAllocatedSlot(Slot slot)
        Returns a slot that has been allocated from this instance. The slot needs have been canceled prior to calling this method.

        The method will transition the slot to the "released" state. If the slot is already in state "released", this method will do nothing.

        指定者:
        returnAllocatedSlot 在接口中 SlotOwner
        参数:
        slot - The slot to return.
        返回:
        True, if the slot was returned, false if not.

      • cancelAndReleaseAllSlots

        public void cancelAndReleaseAllSlots()

      • getTaskManagerGateway

        public TaskManagerGateway getTaskManagerGateway()
        Returns the InstanceGateway of this Instance. This gateway can be used to communicate with it.
        返回:
        InstanceGateway associated with this instance

      • getTaskManagerLocation

        public TaskManagerLocation getTaskManagerLocation()

      • setSlotAvailabilityListener

        public void setSlotAvailabilityListener(SlotAvailabilityListener slotAvailabilityListener)
        Sets the listener that receives notifications for slot availability.
        参数:
        slotAvailabilityListener - The listener.

      • removeSlotListener

        public void removeSlotListener()
        Removes the listener that receives notifications for slot availability.
